implementation.summary: Added priority field to Todo dataclass with default value 0 (low). Supports values 0 (low), 1 (medium), 2 (high). Updated from_dict() to parse and validate priority, to_dict() automatically includes priority via dataclass.asdict().

verification.pytest_command: uv run pytest tests/test_issue_4133_priority_field.py -v && uv run pytest -v
verification.ruff_command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/ tests/
